attributes.action: A national inquiry into the failings of public services in the grooming scandal
attributes.additional_details: Carry out a full public inquiry which would expose those who chose to cover up the rape, torture and death in some cases of some of the most vulnerable in society. Nobody is above the law and those found to have covered up this atrocity and contributed to this 25 year event should be held accountable
attributes.background:
Hold a full and transparent inquiry into the grooming/rape scandal who knew what, when and why this has only just been fully exposed. 
Exactly who knew, how were they enabled and how were they able to silence the victims/families and cover this up this for so long.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
